Module Stratego
Package com.stratego

Class UserDisplayPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
com.stratego.UserDisplayPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class UserDisplayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
A JPanel used to display a Player's information on the left side of the GameView, corresponding to the player whose turn it is.
Author:
Clint Mooney
See Also:
Serialized Form

    An internal panel to organize buttons which could be pressed by the player.

      Parameters:
      selectedPiece - refers to the Piece last selected by the user.
